data.title: Visit Lviv, Ukraine with our intercity taxi in 2024!
data.meta_description: Lviv, Ukraine's architectural jewel, is a city rich in history and culture. Explore the beautiful squares, Gothic churches and Baroque palaces and enjoy the atmosphere of this magical UNESCO-listed city.
data.text:
Rynok Square

The historic centre of Lviv with its magnificent Renaissance and Baroque buildings, where the Town Hall and many museums and galleries are located.

The High Castle

The ruins of a castle on a hill, offering breathtaking panoramic views of the city and its surroundings.

Dominican Cathedral

An imposing Baroque church with a richly decorated interior and a fascinating history.

Lychakiv Cemetery

Historic cemetery with magnificent tombs and mausoleums, considered one of the most beautiful burial grounds in Europe.

Museum of Pharmacy

One of the oldest pharmacies in Europe, now serving as a museum with historical exhibits and pharmacy cabinets.

St. George Church

A monumental rococo church with a magnificent interior that is the seat of the Greek Catholic Church in Ukraine.

Armenian Cathedral

A unique cathedral with exceptional architecture that is a mixture of Gothic, Baroque and Oriental styles.

Lviv Opera House

An impressive Art Nouveau building that houses one of the best opera houses in Ukraine.

Museum of Folk Architecture and Life

An open-air museum that presents traditional Ukrainian architecture and way of life from different regions of the country.

Lviv Brewery and Museum

Visit one of the oldest breweries in Ukraine and see a museum dedicated to the history of brewing and tasting local beer.
